title: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed
OB: When there is no data for a series, there is no error message displayed
EB: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user
SR:
1. Open the application
2. Navigate to the series section
3. Select a series with no data available
4. Verify that no error message is displayed
5. Observe that a friendly error message is not displayed
